ygData.subject: RE: [gladiator] Just had  a funny thought
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting thought, but then if you look it too far, sounds would become even more cluttering.  Ie: while you re playing, you hear, oww ouch! and die

Interesting thought, but then if you look it too far, sounds would
become even more cluttering.  Ie: while you're playing, you hear, "oww
ouch!" and "die fiend!" and "blub blub, gurgle gurgle"  people shouting
all over, would just be a sea of noise.
Plus, who would you get to record for voices.  (Who make the famous "yo"
and "uagh"?)

-----Original Message-----
From: alternate_dph [mailto:dph_of_rules@...] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 2004 8:28 AM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] Just had a funny thought



What if the characters in the game were real?

What would they say when suddenly cheat codes were applied to their
stats?

"Look out!!  The Gods have decided to intervene"

"What the heck!!  We were winning the battle until the providence
changed."
